column5: I don't see any posts this year about netting on LOW. I take it that the concerns have been addressed? It is my understanding that a major portion of the problem was that one individual was taking a multi-lake quota entirely from LOW instead of spreading that quota over all the lakes his quota was good for. The MNR was going to put a stop to that practice. Is this true?
Yes, but there were more than one doing it!!! Netting continues.
It is my understanding that the King fish processing plant in Kenora is closed down. This may reduce some of the netting.
Tow to deep water, cut the floats and let em go!!!!!!
> Tow to deep water, cut the floats and let em go!!!!!! Well, you don't want to get caught!

This is what a guy in Tbay was doing when he came face to face with the natives who set the nets. He was looking at the business end of a .303. Needless to say don't think he'll be doing that again........
